bibl.title: The Appointment of Temple Personnel in the Second Century A.D.: P. Col. Inv. 438.
bibl.note: Letter sent in 156 (?) by Statilius Maximus (probably an epistrategos) to Athenodorus, strategos of the Oxyrhynchite nome (hitherto unknown), pertaining to the appointment of additional pastophoroi in charge of the security at an unidentified temple.
bibl.seg: AUBERT Jean-Jacques, The Appointment of Temple Personnel in the Second Century A.D.: P. Col. Inv. 438.

Letter sent in 156 (?) by Statilius Maximus (probably an epistrategos) to Athenodorus, strategos of the Oxyrhynchite nome (hitherto unknown), pertaining to the appointment of additional pastophoroi in charge of the security at an unidentified temple.
